product_name: 8'' Nordic Ceramic Matte Plain Plate
description:
Please message us if the item you want is not available !

- This piece of ceramic cookware look like piece of artwork, modern plates come in 4 different colors with a natural speckled "Sesame" glaze..
- You can display it on shelves or as decorative pieces to enhance modern and contemporary design.
- Made from Ceramic, one of the sturdiest materials. Easy to clean and maintain.
- They are microwave and oven safe (up to 250°F). Please take care to avoid temperature shocking. These are not stovetop safe. Do not use them on an open flame.

- Dimension for 10" inches : 26.4cm x 2.6 cm, 4 colours 10.4" Diameter x 1" Depth (6.9" base diameter)
                               8" inches: 21.2cm x 2.4cm,4 colours  8.3" Diameter x 1" Depth (5.7" base diameter)

Please note that in general, matte ceramics, although beautiful, require more maintenance than gloss glazed plates. Due to the more textured nature of the matte ceramics, they are more susceptible to flatware marks and stains. The flatware marks may look like scratches, but are actually the result of the softer flatware metal rubbing on the stronger ceramic surface. That said, we recommend being gentle with your flatware when using these ceramics. We recommend hand washing the dishes with soft sponge.



▶ Ready stock, will be shipped out on the day of payment..
▶ There may be 1-3 cm difference due to manual measurement. 
▶ Due to the screen and lighting difference, the color may be a little different from photos.

product_name: [Any 6 Get $12 Off] Luminarc Everyday Collection, [Plate/Bowl/Dinner/Dessert/Coupe/Soup/Salad/Serving/Rice/Pasta/Noodle/
description:
Authorized Luminarc Seller for Shopee Singapore
Beauty often lies in simplicity. The brilliance of the white and the perfect circle of the plates in the Everyday collection smartens up your everyday dining.Their delicacy and lightness combined with ample proportions tastefully highlight your larger dishes. Luminarc opal is tempered, guaranteeing that it will stand up to daily use.
Features:- Made of tempered glass: Tempered glass is a glass material that is up to 5 times stronger than conventional glass. It has extraordinary mechanical and thermal resistance properties.- Dishwasher-safe item: Item designed to withstand several hundred dishwasher cycles, guaranteeing a long-lasting shine.- 100% recyclable: Item made of 100% recyclable and/or reusable material.- 0% Bacteria: Glass is a 100% non-porous material that prevents the retention of bacteria and unpleasant smells.- Perfectly stackable item: Item whose design and composition have been studied to make it perfectly stackable and safe.- High scratch resistance: Item on which an anti-scratch treatment has been applied for excellent resistance to scratches caused by repeated contact with cutlery.- Suitable for microwave cooking: The materials used are designed to withstand microwave use and distribute the heat efficiently to limit the risk of burns.- Heat resistance: Item made for serving hot drinks. It can resist thermal shocks of up to 275° F.- High shock resistance: Item up to 5 times more resistant than an item that has not undergone any specific treatment process, offering a very high shock resistance- Safety glass: Item made of tempered glass, designed to break into small, non-sharp pieces.
Dimensions:Flat Plate - 26.5x2.5cmDinner Plate - 24x2.1cmDessert Plate - 19x1.6cmDeep Plate (Soup) - 22x3.3cmMulti Purpose Bowl - 18x5.4cmSoup Bowl - 21x9.3cmNoodle Bowl - 18x7.5cmRice Bowl - 12x6cmSauce Plate - 11cm
